security: Disclosing information about PURUMEN and QUOLA, as well as the identities of individuals like ODON (ALVAREZ) DE LA CAMPA, GILBERTO (LIWAY) RODRIGUEZ, ALDO (VERA) SERAFIN, and HANOLO (UZIEL), could endanger these operations and the individuals involved. Revealing code names and identities of individuals involved in clandestine activities could compromise ongoing operations and jeopardize the safety of individuals.
summary: A cable from JMWAVE to DIR MEXI regarding KEYWAY PURUMEN QUOLA, referencing AVE 8524/1/- 7/317 and identifying individuals A ODON (ALVAREZ) DE LA CAMPA, B GILBERTO (LIWAY) RODRIGUEZ, C ALDO (VERA) SERAFIN, and D HANOLO (UZIEL). The cable requests action from WE 6, with information copies to DOP, CI, CI/OPS, CI/OA, FI, SAS 8, and VR.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET cable, originating from JMWAVE and addressed to DIR MEXI, concerns KEYWAY PURUMEN QUOLA. Referencing AVE 8524/1/- 7/317, it identifies four individuals: A ODON (ALVAREZ) DE LA CAMPA, B GILBERTO (LIWAY) RODRIGUEZ, C ALDO (VERA) SERAFIN, and D HANOLO (UZIEL). The cable directs action to WE 6 while providing information to DOP, CI, CI/OPS, CI/OA, FI, SAS 8, and VR, indicating a coordinated operational effort.
title: KEYWAY PURUMEN QUOLA
